summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation and special handling charges for services rendered. It includes information about the charges, payment due date, and shipment details, including sender and recipient information. The invoice reflects a total charge of $13.42, with specific details on the services provided and adjustments that can be requested.

persons.name: Lauren Peg Uoland

keyFacts: The total charges on the invoice amount to $13.42.
The payment is due by July 16, 2005.
Two packages were picked up on June 27 and June 28, 2005.
The invoice includes details about fuel surcharges applied to the shipments.
D. Oakley and D. Cruz are FedEx employees who signed for the delivery of packages.
